footer.block1: A hotel for true lovers of luxury and comfort

section2.title: Welcome to an oasis of luxury and tranquility
section2.p1: The 'Kohinur Plaza' Hotel & Spa is located in the old part of the ancient city of Samarkand within walking distance of the Siab Bazaar and the Bibi-Khanym Cathedral Mosque.
section2.p2: The interior of the hotel harmoniously combines European style with elements of national color. Thanks to hand-painted murals, you will glimpse into the past of the city of Samarkand.

section3.title: Accommodation
section3.p: Enjoy superior comfort in our rooms, where every detail is thoughtfully designed for your convenience.
